Articles.Content:
There's a section for this isn't there, or something? Not talking about the spacecraft exchange thing.

Looked around and didn't see what I'm looking for.

Interested in finding someone to do something like

with.

I use a lot of mods though, but would be willing to download others that the other person may use as long as they can do the same. Not sure on any rules, but open to ideas

Someone point me to the right sub forum if there is one, please.

I vaguely remember someone talking about a site where players could share persistent files for downloading, but I don't remember anything other than a few broad strokes.

I think your best bet would be asking around and seeing who would be interested in participating in such a thing, then work out the file-sharing details amongst yourselves.

Would this be what you're looking for?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/26514-Hawkinator-s-almost-multiplayer-pass-along-the-save-file-challenge-thingy
